Class BoardGUI

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • javax.swing.JComponent
          • javax.swing.JPanel
            • es.ucm.fdi.tp.practica6.views.BoardGUI
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, javax.accessibility.Accessible

    public class BoardGUI
extends javax.swing.JPanel
    This class implements a graphic board of the game.

    Esta clase implenta un tablero grafico del juego.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • BoardGUI

        public BoardGUI(Board board,
                java.util.Map<Piece,java.awt.Color> colorMap,
                BoardGUI.BoardGUIListener controlsListener)
        Creates a graphic board according to a given board and a colorMap.

        Crea un tablero grafico en funcion de un tablero dado y un mapa de coloreado.

        Parameters:
        board - Internal board of the game.

        Tablero interno del juego.

        colorMap - Map that indicates the color of the pieces in the board.

        Mapa que indica los colores de las piezas del tablero.

        controlsListener - Listener of the board.

        "Listener" del tablero.
